alert.note: Alert for Allen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 27 at 1:57PM EST until February 28 at 3:08AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... Spy Run Creek at Park Drive At Fort Wayne Children`s Zoo affecting Allen IN County. .Additional thunderstorms early this afternoon will generate excess runoff that will lead to minor flooding of Spy Run Creek in Allen County Indiana. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Spy Run Creek at Park Drive At Fort Wayne Children`s Zoo. * WHEN...From this evening to late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Franke Park Drive along the creek floods as drainage systems backfill. Low profile vehicles become stranded in parking lots by the playground and near the roundabout at the entrance to Franke Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM EST Monday the stage was 8.3 feet and rising rapidly. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest near 11.3 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 hours.
